description:
This course explores an aspect of early American literature intensively; specific course topics will vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS EARLY AMERICAN LIT: Literature of Dissent, 1776-1900:  Reading, Resisting, & Redefining the US
